text: Michael Okon Enyong (born 1969 in Uyo) is a Nigerian politician who represents Uyo, Uruan, Nsit Atai and Ibesikpo Asutan in the Nigerian National Assembly. Before being elected into office, he was chairman of the Akwa Ibom State Tourism Board. Name = Michael Okon Enyong |Nationality= NIGERIAN |Office = National Assembly member |Age = 51 |Alma mata = University of uyo, Uyo. St.Patrick's primary school, iboko offot. |} In 2015, he was elected into the Nigerian National Assembly under the People's Democratic Party (Nigeria). In February 2018, Enyong was accused of being involved in a sex scandal and impregnating a supporter. In a publication made by DailyPost he denies sexual involvement and claims the accusation to be a mudsling by political opponents. == References == Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian politicians Category:Akwa Ibom State politicians Category:People from Akwa Ibom State Category:University of Uyo alumni
title: Michael Enyong
